title: chestcommand插件（指令菜单）在1.8中无法通过右键菜单打开
txt_content:
rt，虽然1.8中用英文代替物品id、但我改成英文后依然没卵用，急急急。

下面是配置文件

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&4命令菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 4

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'cc open main-menu.yml'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: WATCH
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

replies.txt_content: 更换3.1.1以下版本即可 最新的3.1.2我也发现有这个问题

replies.author: 雪狼神
replies.txt_content:
open-with-item:
    item-id: WATCH
    left-click: true
    right-click: true


item-id: 改成 id:
就行了，转载插件的人也没说清楚
